#Load gapminder 
```{r load}
library(gapminder)
```

#Convert gapminder dataframe to a tibble
```{r}
tibble::as_tibble(gapminder)
```

#Present gapminder in a datatable
```{r}
DT::datatable(gapminder)
```

#Some functions that will help analyze the gapminder dataset
names(gapminder)
summary(gapminder)
tail(gapminder)
nrow(gapminder)
ncol(gapminder)
